body:
This is very much specified behavior:

http://tip.golang.org/ref/spec#Function_types

Note the optional comma in Parameters:

```
Parameters     = "(" [ ParameterList [ "," ] ] ")" .
```

The same is true for entries in composite literals, etc. It's a pain to have to think about adding/removing trailing comma's on multi-line parameter lists or composite literals, and this is the obvious syntactic solution.
